glsa.title: Heimdal: Buffer overflow vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple buffer overflow vulnerabilities in Heimdal's telnetd server could allow the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Heimdal is a free implementation of Kerberos 5 that includes a telnetd server.

description.p: It has been reported that the "getterminaltype" function of Heimdal's telnetd server is vulnerable to buffer overflows.

impact.p: An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with the permission of the telnetd server program.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All users should upgrade to the latest available version:
